name: H.B. Fuller Company
description: H.B. Fuller Company is a global leader in adhesives, sealants, and other specialty chemical products. Founded in 1887, the company has a long history of innovation and customer service, providing solutions to a diverse range of industries including packaging, woodworking, construction, and electronics. H.B. Fuller operates in over 40 countries, with a strong commitment to sustainability and the development of environmentally responsible products. The company’s extensive portfolio includes hot melt adhesives, water-based adhesives, and specialty polymers, all designed to meet the specific needs of their customers. H.B. Fuller focuses on innovation, investing significantly in research and development to create high-performance products that enhance productivity and reduce waste. The company aims to support its customers' growth by delivering tailored solutions that help improve product performance and manufacturing efficiency. With a mission to be the best adhesive partner for their customers, H.B. Fuller continues to expand its global presence and product offerings, driving growth and creating value for stakeholders.
